Overview Description:
The javadoc index of the methods provided by the batik toolkit is one big file,
round about 5.8 MB (both online and offline versions of docs).

Steps to reproduce:
Go to the url and click on "Index" in the main frame.

Actual Results:
It takes a long time for loading and slows down the system.

Expected Results:
There should be one file for each initial letter, as seen in the original sun
documentation (http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/index.html).

Hints:
Use javadoc -splitindex to generate seperate files.

Occurs on:
W2K SP3, PIII 1 GHz, 245 MB RAM, Mozilla 1.4

Regards,
Michael.
creator: mholti@web.de
deweese@apache.org
text:
The next time we generate javadocs they will use the 
one letter index.
